attributes.action: Get the top gear crew to do all the roads in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im fed up with the roads in this country! I / we pay our taxes on fuel car tax etc etc yet we are stuck with awful roads! The government do nothing about it except sit back and coin the money in! Im fed up with it, its taken me 30 mins this morning to travel 4 miles in West Sussex as road works on two major routes are down! Its an outrage! Why when we pay so much to the up-keep of the roads are we delayed beyond the acceptable? I would like the government to employ the Top Gear team and ideas in to repairing all the useless roads in Britain.
